description.value: You tumble under and behind your foe to catch them off guard. When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Tumble Through]{Tumble Through}, the foe whose space you passed through is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} against the next attack you make before the end of your turn.
